item.title: CVE-2024-24843|2024-02-21T07:07:55.885Z -- PowerPack Addons for Elementor -- PowerPack Pro for Elementor
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PowerPack Addons for Elementor PowerPack Pro for Elementor.This issue affects PowerPack Pro for Elementor: from n/a before 2.10.8.
